response.original_title: But Words Do Hurt: Stories From GLBTT Youth
response.overview: GLBTT youth from Alberta talk about their identities, coming out, family, the media, and their experiences in school and their dreams and hopes for the future.  Professionals from a wide-variety of backgrounds (police officers, social workers, lawyers, and teachers) also discuss why it is important to address GLBTT issues in schools.
response.title: But Words Do Hurt: Stories From GLBTT Youth
